contexts.context: In the year 1815, after a <mark>solemn</mark> deliberation, in which the Ministers representing the eight...
...Plenipotentiaries, namely that of some general systematic and <mark>solemn</mark> Declaration, to be agreed upon and promulgated on...
...which they have at Vienna given a not less <mark>solemn</mark> sanction. This must materially retard the Ultimate Success...
